item.title: Huaihao Liu
item.description:
I am currently a graduate student in Computer Technology at Ocean University of China, under the supervision of Professor Wei Zhang. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Intelligent Science and Technology from China University of Petroleum . My research focuses on Artificial Intelligence in Meteorology, where I aim to advance weather data analysis and forecasting through deep learning and computer vision techniques.

Email:1072116624@qq.com
